turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Jenna, I need you to call in a coffee order at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks, ma'am?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Target in Cleveland, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what's the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will just have my regular.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am sorry, ma'am, I have not ordered for you at Starbucks yet. What is your regular order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: An Iced Cold Foam Cappacino, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like that with sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, sugar, but please have them add stevia before they top it with foam.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, of course. What size do you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will there be anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please have the foam made with coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. When do you want this ready for pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In the next 15 to 20 minutes, please. I'll be running in and out quickly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order is in and will be ready shortly, then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, ma'am.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Where will I see a receipt for this?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be in your text messages any moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Bye.
